text: 6:56 Matyu 9:20; 14:36; Aposel 19:12Iesus nguibar ekiaba ko nguibar doziba ko ruarir nguibabar zui. A zuir nguibar kaba me arazir kamram ami, me arɨmariar gumazamiziba inigha iza nguibamɨn tongɨn da arɨgha, egha a gakaghora ghaze, a men asughtɨma, arɨmariaba itiba an korotiar avɨzibar suigham. Ezɨ gumazamizir an korotiamɨn suiziba, men arɨmariaba gefi.
